about_the_game:
Synopsis

A mad scientist has kidnapped you and turned you into one of his test subjects, number 69. Since you’ve been classified as extremely dangerous, you find yourself waking up, locked away in a high security room, inside of a containment cell. Now you must break out and become the host for a parasitic slime ball named “Pairiasite”. In order to get to the mad scientist you will have to fight all the other test subjects that he has created, thus turning them into brainless killing machines with super powers.

Gameplay

Together, you and Pairiasite will need to break into and platform through each habitat to get to the test subjects that are kept in them. There are a variety of habitats that you will need to platform through, ranging from a fancy ice cube, to the desert, and even to the future. Each test subject has their own unique powers that you will need to fight against. Such as super strength, super speed, and a lot more really super stuff.

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING

This game contains bright flashing lights and loud noises, that may be unsuitable for people with epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual jokes, crude humor, dark humor, and swearing.

name: Powers To Poison

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12

steam_germany.descriptors:
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache

short_description: You are subject number 69, a dangerous experiment made by a mad scientist. You become the host for a parasite named “Pairiasite” who gives you powers. Now you must defeat all the other subjects and get revenge on that nut job of a scientist. And find a way out if you can.
